00031   class InetAddress : public VRTObject, public HasFields {
00032     private: struct in_addr  ipv4;
00033     private: struct in6_addr ipv6;

00090       return ipv4;

00095       return ipv6;
00096     }

00111     public: virtual bool equals (const InetAddress &addr) const;

00115       return getHostAddress();

00159   // See VRTMath.c for function code
00160   namespace VRTMath {
00166     inline void packInetAddr (void *ptr, int32_t off, const InetAddress &val) {
00167       char *buf = (char*)ptr;
00168       memcpy(&buf[off], &val.toIPv6().s6_addr[0], 16);
00169     }
00170 
00176     inline void packInetAddr (vector<char> &buf, int32_t off, const InetAddress &val) {
00177       memcpy(&buf[off], &val.toIPv6().s6_addr[0], 16);
00178     }
00179 
00185     inline InetAddress unpackInetAddr (const void *ptr, int32_t off) {
00186       return InetAddress(ptr, off, 16);
00187     }
00188 
00194     inline InetAddress unpackInetAddr (const vector<char> &buf, int32_t off) {
00195       return InetAddress(buf, off);
00196     }
00197   } END_NAMESPACE
00198 } END_NAMESPACE
